name: Ultra Pong (telstargames)
description:
A version of Pong with A2600/IntelliVision level graphics!

Features;

  • Switch between single-player and multi-player
  • Singular and multi-paddle mods
  • 16-color display

Controls;

W/S - player 1

O/L - player 2 (if multiplayer)

SPACE - single/multi player (if game didn't start)

UP - gamemode 1 (if game didn't start)

DOWN - gamemode 0 (if game didn't start)

LEFT - start the game

ESC - exit
